trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section for Web request modules.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Web 要求模組的組態區段。

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to the [<webRequestModules> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/webrequestmodules-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會對應到[ <webRequestModules>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/webrequestmodules-element-network-settings.md)組態項目。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to access information about modules registered to create requests made with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用來存取登錄來建立與提出要求的模組的相關資訊<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.WebClient>類別。

trans-unit.source: This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供以程式設計方式存取可以儲存在組態檔中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModulesSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModulesSection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of Web request modules in the section.
trans-unit.target: 取得區段中 Web 要求模組的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModuleElementCollection" /> containing the registered Web request modules.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModuleElementCollection" />，包含註冊的 Web 要求模組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModuleElementCollection> returned by this property contains one <xref:System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModuleElement> for each Web request module in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModuleElementCollection>傳回此屬性包含一個<xref:System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModuleElement>每個 Web 要求模組的組態檔中。
